newsitem.title: EU: EP CULTURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - DEC 10.
newsitem.headline: EP CULTURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - DEC 10.

text.p: Committee on Culture, Youth, Education and the Media [[ Tuesday 10 December 1996 ]] 0. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE220.553 ) 2. The Commission's report on the consideration of cultural aspects in European Community action (T04825) COS0414 SEC(96)0686 C4-0249/96 + JEUN Fond R ESCUDERO LOPEZ J. (PPE) (PE219.967 ) - Adoption of draft report 3. Harmonization of national legislation on resale rights - graphic and plastic arts (T04369) COD96085 COM(96)0097 C4-0251/96 + JEUN Avis A KERR Hugh. (PSE) (PE218.726 ) F JURI Fond R PALACIO VALLELERSUND (PPE) (PE217.568/A ) - Adoption of draft opinion 4. Any other business 5. Date of next meeting (PE/XII/OJ/97-01 ) 6. 7. The COM and SEC documents mentioned above will be available on request at th e meeting. - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
